R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO HOLDINGS REPORTS
STRONG SECOND QUARTER ONGOING EPS GROWTH

R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: RJR) today
announced strong ongoing earnings per share growth for the

RJRO000001 137125821

summary: R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: RJR) today announced strong ongoing earnings per share growth for the second quarter of 2000. The following press release was distributed to the news media on July 20. For confidential support, call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255 or visit http://www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org/. For support on suicide matters in the UK, contact the Samaritans.
